title: Born in the Anthropocene
tagline: An interactive narrative exploring a sustainable future based in collective welfare and critical thought
summary: is a 3-part interactive narrative implemented using Twine and p5.js. Users navigate a society founded on collective welfare, postmodern education, and multigenerational, communal family structures.
role: Writer, Graphics Artist, Twine Developer, p5.js Developer

title: AI Museum Dataset Site
tagline: Web-based visualization/landing page for my AI Museum Dataset independent study in Fall 2025
summary: is a web-based visualization and landing site for my 2025-2026 independent study with Dr. Abigale Stangl at the Georgia Institute of Technology

title: Jam Packed
tagline: A roller-derby video game developed for the mGBA emulator
summary: is a fast paced, single-player roller derby game created for the mGBA emulator

title: TravelMate
tagline: an interactive travel planning web application
summary: is an interactive travel planning web application built with Django and HTML. Users input their dates, destination, and activities to receive custom AI and API powered weather forecasts, packing lists, and additional travel tips.Â
